name: .OPJ File Extension
summary: Learn about .OPJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An OPJ file is a project created by Origin, a data analysis and graphing application used by various scientists and engineers. It contains all of the project contents, which includes data, 2D/3D graphs, and settings.

content: The OPJ file is the most common file type associated with Origin since it is used as a container for projects. You can open OPJ files with Origin and you can also open OPJ files with Origin Viewer, a free, lightweight program that allows you to view and copy information in OPJ projects.
To open an OPJ file in Origin, select File → Open..., select the ".opj" file type, navigate to the OPJ file location, and click Open.
To save an OPJ file in Origin, select File → Save project or Save Project As..., name the file, choose the save location, and click Save.
NOTE: The release of Origin 2018 included an updated unicode format for saving projects (.OPJU), which features performance advantages over the older, non-unicode OPJ file format.
